__e: If your father would be here.. ..he would have given many things on your farewell
I have done my best to... stand in your mother's place and offer the advice she would have given. And now...
If she did, I'm sure she would have given you a sign.
Come on. We both know the girl wasn't gonna let you die.
It wouldn't have hurt you... ... tohavefoundout what the gentleman wanted.
- I mean, I guess he wouldn't have released you if it was anything serious.
Like what she would have said to you about sex or the day you got your first --
He would have told you what I did and I couldn't let that happen.
But right before that, he would tell you that sometimes we gotta take a chance. Particularly for the people we care about.
Did you see the size of it?
If he didn't believe there was still something in you worth trying to save he would've killed you.
Would it have killed you to say, "I know you love him, but Michael's a jerk"?
I don't believe he'd hurt you, any of you.

But, honey, I love you very much... and if I held anything back, or I mean, details, anything... it was only because... it wouldn't have changed the outcome, and it would have caused you a lot of pain.
If you'd tried that at St Clete's School for Girls, we'd have given you a pink belly that glowed in the dark.
And if I hadn't taught you to read and write, your sister never would have found you.
She'd never ask you to do a thing like that.
